DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate ovarian reserve change preoperative depot medroxyprogesterone acetate ( DMPA ) woman ovarian endometrioma undergo laparoscopic cystectomy .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Pre-operative Depo Medroxyprogesterone Acetate Serum Anti-mullerian Hormone Level After Laparoscopic Ovarian Cystectomy Endometriomas
DOC.criteria: Healthy woman 1840 year old A diagnosis endometrioma diameter least 3 cm . Candidates laparoscopic cystectomy Patients ' refusal participate Not candidate depot medroxyprogesterone acetate : cirrhosis , chronic kidney disease , venous thrombosis Use estrogensuppressive drug precede 3 month , : Oral contraceptive , GnRH analogues , Progestins , Danazol Pathology report present endometriosis
